hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT jp FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobParameterImpl AS jp WHERE jp.jobDescriptorId = :jobDescriptorId
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT jd) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobDescriptorImpl AS jd
SELECT DISTINCT jd FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobDescriptorImpl AS jd
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT jp) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobParameterImpl AS jp
SELECT DISTINCT jp FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobParameterImpl AS jp
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT jl) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobLogImpl AS jl
SELECT DISTINCT jl FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.scheduler.model.impl.SJobLogImpl AS jl
